column1: Smoque BBQ////The pulled pork and fries
column3: as the reason that I'm giving Smoque only three stars. The pulled pork was simply not that great - dry and a little flavorless
column4: even with the little tub of sauce drizzled all over it
column5: and the bun was nothing to write home about. The fries were only a little above lukewarm when we got them
column6: and they were drenched in oil - twisting it a little bit resulted in squeezing drops of oil out.
